summary: Completed comprehensive testing of updated G&A Pallet website with dark theme map, 10 pallet types, and enhanced professional imagery. All core functionality working perfectly including backend APIs, frontend UI, and integrations.
passed_tests: Backend API health endpoints (/api/, /api/health) - 100% success
Contact form API endpoint (/api/contact) - POST and GET working perfectly
Quote form API endpoint (/api/quote) - POST and GET working perfectly
API error handling with proper validation (422 responses)
Home page loads with professional warehouse hero image
Navigation works perfectly for all 6 pages (Home, About, Services, Machinery, Pallets, Contact)
Contact page displays dark theme map using CARTO tiles with green custom marker
Contact page shows correct location: 8827 Clinton Dr, Houston, TX with MapLibre GL
Contact form submission works - form resets after successful submission
Pallets page shows exactly 10 pallet types as required
Pallets page displays 'Popular' tags on 7 pallet types
Quote form submission works perfectly - form integrates with backend API
All CTA buttons navigate correctly (Hero buttons to /pallets and /services)
Phone links (713) 670-8118 are functional across all pages (6+ links found)
Email links to sales@gapallet.com work correctly (3+ links found)
Machinery page shows Champion QC306 and HR100 Wood-Mizer info with professional images
All images are relevant to pallet business and wood processing industry
Professional black theme with green accents (#22C55E) implemented correctly
Dark theme background (rgb(9, 9, 11)) detected across site
Footer displays complete contact information on all pages
Map marker shows correct G&A Pallet location with green custom marker
Contact form displays success message after submission
Quote form handles all field types including dropdown selection
Responsive design elements working properly
Professional pallet warehouse and machinery images throughout site

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All API endpoints working flawlessly (8/8 tests passed)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All features working perfectly including dark map, 10 pallet types, forms, navigation
